Title: BreakTime
Content: This is a project I created as part of my Databases class in fall 2023. It is a myAnimeList knock off for movies and netflix shows, written entire in Javascript. For the front end I used React and material UI to create all the front end components, and on the backend I used ExpressJS to create a REST API that was connected to the MySQL / MariaDB database. This was originally supposed to be a group project, but if you look at the commit logs, I wrote the entire application after one group member got seriously Ill and the other was completely absent.

Title: Toy Compiler
Content: This is a small project that I've been working on as part of my compilers class. The goal was to develop a functional compiler for the C- language, a subset of C that is specified in the Introduction to Compilers and Language Design text book by Douglas Thain. At the moment, it can perform language lexing, syntax checking and semantic correctness checks. I plan on coninuing to work on this project until I can generate a LLVM compatable Intermediate Representation.

Title: Personal Website
Content: This is the website you're using right now! In the past it was written using plain HTML, CSS, and Javascript, but recently I've quickly rewritten it in react in order to have a nice portfolio app for myself. It uses the material Ui library for alot of the ui components, aswell as a fre custom components. Still a work in progress!

Title: Theatre Project
Content: This is a simple app that myself and a few of my class mates wrote that fufills the needs of a movie theatre organizition for displaying, purchasing, and handling movie tickets online. It was writting using Java Swing and Java, and makes use of a MySQL data base.
